com.example.valuesport.LocationService

Class LocationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.valuesport.LocationService.LocationService

  • public class LocationService
extends java.lang.Object
    LocationService is the class for allowing user to access location through Global Positioning System.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private float fullDistance 
      private static float LOCATION_DISTANCE

      private android.location.LocationListener mLocationListener 
      private android.location.LocationManager mLocationManager 
      private static java.lang.String TAG 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocationService(android.app.Activity activity, android.content.Context context)
      Defines starting values for LocationManager object, full distance and Last location.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns full distance the user has traveled
      private void initializeLocationManager()
      Initializes LocationManager object that is used in getting the location from LocationListener.
      void startListeningLoc()
      Calls initialization of LocationManager.
      void stopListeningLoc()

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocationService

        public LocationService(android.app.Activity activity,
                       android.content.Context context)
        Defines starting values for LocationManager object, full distance and Last location. They are set to null and zero until values are given in corresponding methods.
        Parameters:
        activity - activity needed for context
        context - current context to be used with LocationManager and toast widget

    • Method Detail

      • initializeLocationManager

        private void initializeLocationManager()
        Initializes LocationManager object that is used in getting the location from LocationListener.

      • startListeningLoc

        public void startListeningLoc()
        Calls initialization of LocationManager. Starts to listen location updates using LocationManager and LocationListener.
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if permission has not been granted for listening location updates.

      • stopListeningLoc

        public void stopListeningLoc()
        Stops location updates. Sets LocationManager and location to null and traveled distance to 0.

      • getfullDistance

        public float getfullDistance()
        Returns full distance the user has traveled
        Returns:
        fullDistance the added up distance the user has traveled
